Reviews.Title: Nice set.
Reviews.Author: Mudman
Reviews.Content: TV has an amazing picture, & all the inputs I needed save for fiberoptic.  Would have given 5 stars but the sound is not as amazing as the set itself.  Uses 36 watts; great for camping.

Reviews.Title: 12v tv
Reviews.Author: Bill
Reviews.Content: This was a great addition to our boat. The tv works great and has a great picture. Worth the money we paid.

Reviews.Title: great t.v.!
Reviews.Author: J. A. Goetz "doll maid"
Reviews.Content: This t.v. has been a wonderful item for my husband in his truck. He is enjoying it very much. I recommend this t.v. for any truck driver!

Reviews.Title: Good Picture, weak sound
Reviews.Author: J. Duggan
Reviews.Content: Picked for size.  Replacing TV on boat.  Runs well and great picture and menu layout.  Did not expect much from sound based on reviews and that is what we got.  Built in sound from a laptop was noticeably better.  Will add speakers or sound bar.

Reviews.Title: great pic right out of thr box
Reviews.Author: joe colclasure
Reviews.Content: Best price and works great in my boat, would recomend to anyone who wants a great tv in a boat

Reviews.Title: Don't waste your money.
Reviews.Author: ScottH61
Reviews.Content: Don't waste your money on this Supersonic TV.  Just over 90 days old, and it completely died.  No power at all.  Voltage out of the power brick tests good, so I know it is the TV that quit.  And wouldn't you know it?  They offer ONLY a 90 day warranty.  Save yourself some grief, and buy a TV from a company that will stand behind their products a little longer.

ProductInfo.Features:
22" Widescreen HD LED TV
Slim LED Design
Resolution: 1366 x 768
High Definition Digital ATSC TV Tuner
Aspect Ratio: 16:9
ProductInfo.Name: 22 Inch Supersonic SC-2211 12 Volt AC/DC Widescreen Full 1080p HD LED TV w/ ATSC Digital Tuner
